answers.answer: Yes, very normal. I ate a lot of cereal and bread in first trimester. It was the only thing that sounded good and was easy to digest. I had pretty bad morning sickness though too. Im now in my third trimester and all i want is sweets. Yikes!
Totally normal!   I am almost 14 weeks and today all i want are pickles! Talk about stereotypical cravings
Im 7wks 4 days and i can only eat carbs and chicken soup. Everything else makes me want to vomit! I hope it changes. Good luck and enjoy those carbs!
Sounds lame but all I crave is top ramen. I'm 8 weeks now with my second. I was so sick with my first I hardly ate anything until my second trimester
Omg, thank you all. You just gave me so sort of relief.

question: I'm in my first trimester and I've notice majority of what I have been eating is just carbs. When I eat meat, it makes me want to throw up or nauseous & I'm forcing myself to consume vegetables and fruits. This is my first pregnancy and need help. I'm scared I might have or get gestational diabetes. Help mommas & thanks in advance.
title: Is it normal to crave carbs only? Help!
